i just finished reading the story, it's vary good. have you writen anything 
else?
about my charecter, it really depends on what you need in the story, but if 
you can't decide i'll do it for you:
dancing corpse is just a genral lowlife of the city, not on either side. in 
fact he is ablivious to the fact that there even is a struggle. He is more 
likely to symathies with the revolution.
he is the only person in the city that is the same size as hightower and has 
hair of a bright blue. (i really have blue hair)
probably the charecters will meet him just because he stands out in the 
croud so much or maybe they will meet him hired to guard something.
he is suprisingly smart for his position in life (suprisingly being 
relitave, he's about average) and is always trying to be funny to a varying 
digree of success.
if asked he will tell you that his name is a long story (he really got it 
from a prank he once did with some friends inwhich he dressed up as an 
undead to try and scare away a shopkeeper, which didn't work. he also thinks 
it has a nice ring to it).
he would probably be considered a solder or a barbarian.
if you need anything else just ask.

nickname?
